start_message: Hello! I'm the support bot. How can I help you?
describe: Please describe your issue in more detail in a single message
FinalMessage: Thank you! Your message has been received. Our support team will get back to you shortly.
technical_faq: Here are the most common issues and what you can try (Random AI-generated FAQ): ‚Ä¢ The app won't start ‚Üí Try restarting your device or reinstalling the app. ‚Ä¢ Unable to log in ‚Üí Check your login/password and make sure your internet connection is stable. ‚Ä¢ Nothing is loading ‚Üí Clear the cache and try switching networks (Wi-Fi ‚Üî mobile data). ‚Ä¢ The app keeps crashing ‚Üí Close unnecessary processes and update the app to the latest version. ‚Ä¢ The server is not responding ‚Üí Wait a couple of minutes and try again ‚Äî maintenance may be in progress. ‚Ä¢ Notifications are not coming through ‚Üí Check notification permissions and battery-saving settings. ‚Ä¢ Features work inconsistently ‚Üí Update the app and restart it ‚Äî this often fixes minor bugs. ‚Ä¢ Payment error ‚Üí Make sure your card is active and has enough balance. ‚Ä¢ UI displays incorrectly ‚Üí Adjust system scaling or restart the app. ‚Ä¢ Slow performance ‚Üí Clear the cache and check available storage space.
payment_faq: Here are common payment questions and what you can try (Random AI-generated FAQ): ‚Ä¢ Payment declined ‚Üí Check your card's expiration date and try a different payment method. ‚Ä¢ Money was deducted, but the purchase didn't appear ‚Üí Restart the app and wait a few minutes ‚Äî sometimes processing is delayed. ‚Ä¢ Error entering card details ‚Üí Ensure the fields are filled out correctly and 3D-Secure is enabled. ‚Ä¢ Payment stuck at confirmation stage ‚Üí Check your internet connection and try again. ‚Ä¢ Subscription not activated ‚Üí Refresh purchase status in settings or perform a resync. ‚Ä¢ Too many payment attempts ‚Üí Wait 10‚Äì15 minutes and try again; the bank may have temporarily blocked transactions.
feature_faq: Here are common feature questions and what you can try (Random AI-generated FAQ): ‚Ä¢ How to use feature X? ‚Üí Check the user guide in the help section or on our website. ‚Ä¢ Feature Y is not working as expected ‚Üí Check the feature settings and ensure the app is updated to the latest version. ‚Ä¢ Where can I find feature Z? ‚Üí Feature Z is available in the settings menu under the 'Advanced' section. ‚Ä¢ Can I customize feature A to my needs? ‚Üí Yes, feature A has flexible settings that can be changed in the 'Settings' section. ‚Ä¢ Feature B is causing errors ‚Üí Try restarting the app and clearing the cache. If the problem persists, contact support. ‚Ä¢ How to disable feature C? ‚Üí Feature C can be disabled in the app settings under the 'Features' section.
ticket_question: What type of issue are you experiencing?

questions.text: On what device and OS are you experiencing the issue?
What version of the app are you using?
Which payment method did you use?
When did you try to make the payment?
Did you receive any error message?
Is the problem with password, email, or access?
Have you tried to reset your password?
